name: Uhhh, helm
description:
A game made for 7DRL Challenge 2021

You play as a viking who is searching for something. The viking does not know what he is looking for, or why, but he is determined to find it. To solve the great mystery. It takes him on a trip over grasslands, boats and even dungeons. But deep down in the darkest areas of the dungeon, he will find it...

Movement: Arrow keys

Throw and axe: F-key

Coding: velopman and Liioni

Art: Liioni

Game design: velopman and Liioni

Music by TeknoAXE
